languages.text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на тебе подобных, мон-кай. Но я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере — сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на тебе подобных, мон-кай. Но я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере — сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на тебе подобных, мон-кай. Но я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере — сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".

But I am not so stupid as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari te dirige una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «Lloro por los que ya no están. Mi corazón arde de dolor y furia cuando os veo a ti y a los de tu ralea, mon-keigh. Pero no cometeré la insensatez de desafiarte. Al menos, no en este momento. Tú aún me necesitas, y yo... aún te necesito a ti».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari te dirige una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «Lloro por los que ya no están. Mi corazón arde de dolor y furia cuando os veo a ti y a los de tu ralea, mon-keigh. Pero no cometeré la insensatez de desafiarte. Al menos, no en este momento. Tú aún me necesitas, y yo... aún te necesito a ti».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}アエルダリがあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n} 「私は、もうこの世にいない者たちを悼む。お前たちの姿を見るだけで、この心は痛みと怒りで燃え上がるぞ、モン＝ケイよ。だが私はお前に挑むほど愚かではない。少なくとも今はな。お前はまだ私を必要としているし、私にとっても…お前はまだ必要だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリがあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n} 「私は、もうこの世にいない者たちを悼む。お前たちの姿を見るだけで、この心は痛みと怒りで燃え上がるぞ、モン＝ケイよ。だが私はお前に挑むほど愚かではない。少なくとも今はな。お前はまだ私を必要としているし、私にとっても…お前はまだ必要だ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族试探性地打量着你。{/n}“我为那些离世之人感到悲伤。一看到你和你的同类，我的心就会燃起痛苦与愤怒。但我不会蠢到挑战你，至少现在不行。你还需要我，而我……我也同样需要你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族试探性地打量着你。{/n}“我为那些离世之人感到悲伤。一看到你和你的同类，我的心就会燃起痛苦与愤怒。但我不会蠢到挑战你，至少现在不行。你还需要我，而我……我也同样需要你。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari vous lance un regard pénétrant.{/n} « Je pleure ceux qui ne sont plus. Mon cœur brûle de douleur et de rage à votre simple vue ainsi qu'à celle de vos semblables, mon-keigh. Mais je ne suis pas imprudent au point de vous défier. Pas maintenant, du moins. Vous avez encore besoin de moi, et... j'ai encore besoin de vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari vous lance un regard pénétrant.{/n} « Je pleure ceux qui ne sont plus. Mon cœur brûle de douleur et de rage à votre simple vue ainsi qu'à celle de vos semblables, mon-keigh. Mais je ne suis pas imprudent au point de vous défier. Pas maintenant, du moins. Vous avez encore besoin de moi, et... j'ai encore besoin de vous. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari starrt dich forschend an.{/n} "Ich trauere um alle, die nicht mehr sind. Mein Herz brennt vor Schmerz und ich empfinde Wut, wenn ich Euch und Euresgleichen anblicke, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber ich bin nicht so dumm, Euch herauszufordern. Jedenfalls nicht im Moment. Ihr braucht mich noch und ich ... brauche Euch noch."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari starrt dich forschend an.{/n} "Ich trauere um alle, die nicht mehr sind. Mein Herz brennt vor Schmerz und ich empfinde Wut, wenn ich Euch und Euresgleichen anblicke, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber ich bin nicht so dumm, Euch herauszufordern. Jedenfalls nicht im Moment. Ihr braucht mich noch und ich ... brauche Euch noch."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, bakışlarıyla seni inceliyor.{/n} "Artık aramızda olmayanların yasını tutuyorum. Seni ve mon-keigh olacak o türünü görünce yüreğim, acı ve öfkeyle yanıyor. Ancak sana meydan okuyacak kadar ahmak değilim. Şu anda bana ihtiyacın var... Benim de sana."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of you and your ilk, mon-keigh. But I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not now, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, sana inceleyen bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Artık olmayanların yasını tutuyorum. Seni ve mon-keigh olacak o türünü görünce bile yüreğim acı ve öfkeyle yanıyor. Ancak sana meydan okuyacak kadar ahmak değilim. Her hâlükârda şu an bana ihtiyacın var ve... Benim de sana ihtiyacım var."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
